mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_ADD, USER_PHONE1, USER_PHONE2, USER_PHONE3, USER_EMAIL, USER_REG_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userAdd}, #{userPNum1}, #{userPNum2}, #{userPNum3}, #{userEmail}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_ADD, USER_PHONE1, USER_PHONE2, USER_PHONE3, USER_EMAIL, USER_REG_DATE, FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword}
